p: A multivariate analysis of the severity of HFMD considering 459 severe and 246 mild cases of HFMD, respectively, in China, found four risk factors more frequently in severe cases: (1) fatigue ( p < 0.01, OR = 204.7); (2) the use of glucocorticoids ( p = 0.03, OR = 10.44); (3) the use of dehydrating agents ( p < 0.01, OR = 73.7), and (4) a maculopapular rash ( p < 0.01, OR = 84.4) [ 91]. Other reports also suggest the use of steroids in acute encephalitis cases associated with EV-A71 clearly exacerbate central nervous system damage [ 82].
